MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL60 and LL77 postcode areas of Gaerwen and Llangefni, affecting properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.54PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.00PM on 26th January 2021.
